items.sentence: Would you like to come in and have a cup of coffee?
Would you like to go fishing on Saturday afternoon?
Tom took out a book, opened it and started reading.
Tom tried to control his breathing and remain calm.
Where do you want to go during the summer vacation?
Who do you think is the best student in your class?
Tom said he was at home on the night of the murder.
Tom said that he paid thirty dollars for this book.
Tom said that he was hoping that you would do that.
Tom and Mary have kissed each other more than once.
